questions.question: What is the main goal of introducing amino groups into Tb-MOF-76?
questions.answer: To decrease pore sizes and facilitate multiple guest-host interactions in confined pores, thus boosting C2H6/C2H4 separation.

questions.question: What is the global production of ethylene as of 2021?
True or False: Tb-MOF-76(NH2) has a higher C2H6/C2H4 selectivity compared to Tb-MOF-76.
What is the kinetic diameter of ethane?
Why are C2H6-selective adsorbents preferred over C2H4-selective adsorbents for ethylene purification?
questions.answer: Because they preferentially capture C2H6 impurity over C2H4, allowing one-step harvest of C2H4 in a single breakthrough operation process.

questions.question: True or False: The introduction of amino groups into Tb-MOF-76 results in a decrease in C2H4 and C2H6 uptakes.
What is the productivity of C2H4 (> 99.95% purity) achieved by Tb-MOF-76(NH2) from a 1/1 C2H6/C2H4 mixture?
True or False: Tb-MOF-76(NH2) shows improved separation performance for C2H6/C2H4 mixtures compared to Tb-MOF-76.
What is the effect of amino-functionalization on the pore environment of Tb-MOF-76?
questions.answer: It optimizes the pore environment by decreasing pore sizes and increasing guest-host interactions, enhancing C2H6/C2H4 separation.

questions.question: True or False: The separation of C2H6 and C2H4 is straightforward due to their significantly different boiling points.
What is the boiling point of ethylene?
How does the amino-functionalization affect the adsorption isotherms of C2H6 and C2H4 in Tb-MOF-76(NH2)?
questions.answer: It results in steeper adsorption isotherms, implying stronger adsorbate-adsorbent interactions.

questions.question: True or False: The amino-functionalized Tb-MOF-76(NH2) has a larger pore size compared to Tb-MOF-76.
What is the selectivity of Tb-MOF-76(NH2) for C2H6/C2H4 mixtures at 100 kPa?
True or False: The introduction of amino groups into Tb-MOF-76 does not affect its structural stability.
What is the main challenge in separating C2H6 and C2H4?
questions.answer: Their similar kinetic diameters and boiling points make the separation extremely challenging.

questions.question: True or False: Tb-MOF-76(NH2) can be directly used in industrial applications without any modifications.
What is the role of amino (NH2) groups in enhancing gas adsorption and separation in MOFs?
questions.answer: NH2 groups serve as accessible sites to form multiple C-H···N hydrogen bonds with light hydrocarbon molecules, enhancing interactions.

questions.question: True or False: The amino-functionalization strategy is unique to Tb-MOF-76 and cannot be applied to other MOFs.
What is the significance of achieving a high C2H4 productivity in the separation of C2H6/C2H4 mixtures?
questions.answer: High C2H4 productivity indicates efficient separation and purification, crucial for industrial applications requiring polymer-grade C2H4.
